It would be so exciting to have animations for eva, like hatches opening and the kerbals getting out of the pods, also it would be great if we could see the hatch opening in the pod when we eva WHILE we Iva'd

I know that might require a complete render and animation work for the pods, all the pods, but it would make EVA experience way better

Tin Yeung
YES!!! This is one of the biggest things missing from the game IMO!
Wheels! Closing/opening intakes. (oh, for that one, we'll need a need for closing them first)

But than it will mean the end of the era of Hitchhiker passengers go EVA.

(And that'd be good oh I do really want some airlock differentiation on crewed parts).
Yes. Although there are a BUNCH of stuff that should happen first, Animated parts should happen some time.
